title: MacBook Air 2018 - Is It Enough?
description: The 2018 MacBook Air is all new but how does it stack up to fanless laptops like the 12" MacBook? Latest video on our new channel!  I switched to the iPhone XR:   Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
